Author: frieren14
Name: VisibilityPlus
Description:
Fork of https://github.com/SheepGoMeh/VisibilityPlugin by SheepGoMeh. Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Includes VoidList, which is a better blacklist.
Accessible via /pvis
More information available via /xlhelp
Punchline: Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
